column4: Hi how do I get rid of this message when running aptitude upgrade: dpkg-query: warning: parsing file '/var/lib/dpkg/status' near line 58504 package 'openshot-ffmpeg':  error in Version string 'git-2623d8f-1': version number does not start with digit
you mean tar file? or .deb?  Not that I recall
mm  first i would attempt  a  sudo apt-get install -f
